title: Building Healthy Daily Habits
headline: Learn how to adopt healthy daily habits for a more rewarding life with this free online course,
description: Daily habits are often labelled as the driving force behind self-improvement. You might already have set daily habits, but some of these habits might be holding you back. This free online course will teach you how to build a great life, from cellphone hygiene to portion sizes, by adopting positive habits. By taking control of your life and daily habits, your creativity will blossom, and you will lead a happy and successful life.
courseDescription:
Are you struggling to lead a happy and successful life? Obtaining this success may be as simple as adopting good wellness habits into your life. In this course, you will learn to manage different areas of your life using the techniques created by personal development expert TJ Walker. One tool that you will study is the Selfie Speak Programming model. Walker developed this recording technique to introduce new daily habits in life and help people achieve their goals. There’s no need to worry if you don’t have any prior knowledge of audio production on a smartphone.

This course is perfect for beginners. We will show you how to use simple tools and tips for common recording problems you may experience. The most simple tool discussed in this course is your smartphone and the applications that already come with your device. You will also learn about the positive benefits of a sense of accomplishment, and you can quickly achieve a positive sense of self as you wake up in the morning.

You will take a deep dive into the two types of consumption in your life that are holding you back: entertainment and food. You will learn why the daily habit of watching hours and hours of news could be holding back your creativity. We will show you how to handle your email address by learning who you should be sharing it with and who you should not. How often do you check your phone in a single day? This course covers which apps you should keep on your device and why you should frequently use the power button. We will then study the food you put into your body and how that has changed throughout history. This includes the rise of calorie intake for most, obesity, and the number one cause of obesity: giant portion sizes. We also cover how to avoid overeating in restaurants in this section. As you continue your studies in this course, you will become more aware of ways to lead a healthy life outside of the food you consume. You will learn methods to motivate yourself to work out daily. You will also learn how to get a full night’s sleep without any distractions from electronics. This course finishes with clutter and how you can avoid filling your house with useless junk. This section includes the Marie Kondo method of decluttering, why you should avoid storage bins and organise your work desk for maximum success. You will develop a solid understanding of how simple habits make up your life and affect your creativity and ability to succeed. Start this course today to learn how to incorporate positive daily routines in your life and achieve the success you always wanted to achieve.
